  "description": "LawPavilion Business Solutions is the No1 Africa provider of LegalTech and Artificial Intelligence solutions in the legal industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Customer Account Manager

Job Locations:&nbsp;Enugu &amp; Imo
Employment Type: Full Time

About the Role


	We are seeking a seasoned Client Account Manager to oversee and grow relationships with clients across the Eastern Region.
	This strategic role combines account management, client relationship leadership, and revenue growth.
	You will serve as the key liaison between the company and our legal and corporate clients, oversee key accounts, and ensure the region meets its revenue targets.
	The ideal candidate is client-focused, results-driven, and skilled at balancing relationship management with revenue growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage a portfolio of high-value client accounts, ensuring consistent engagement, satisfaction, and retention.
	Follow up on client renewals, payments, and subscription cycles to drive revenue growth.
	Serve as the main point of contact for client accounts in your region
	Provide onboarding, training, and ongoing support to users
	Identify opportunities to upsell or expand services within accounts
	Work closely with internal teams (sales, support, product) to address client feedback and issues


Qualifications


	At least 4 years of account management experience, preferably in legal tech or related industries.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills
	Previous experience in client relationship management, customer success, or account management
	Familiarity with legal industry practices or SaaS products is a plus
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple client accounts effectively
	Good presentation, negotiation, and follow-up skills
	Must be a resident in or have strong familiarity with Enugu and/or Imo States
	Familiarity with CRM tools and Microsoft Office tools.


What We Offer


	A dynamic and innovative work environment.
	Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
	Career growth opportunities within a leading LegalTech company.
	Training and exposure to cutting-edge legal technology solutions.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume, cover letter, and any relevant certifications to:&nbsp;careers@lawpavilion.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

title: Job Openings at PlugZone Online
content:
PlugZone Online is a business management consultant with core competencies in Human capital development, Human resources management, Digital marketing, Web development & Design, IT and Support services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Assistant

Job Location: Ojuelegba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client is looking for a competitive retail Sales Assistant to help customers identify products, process customer lists and help purchase products.
	Duties include selling, Shelving and invoicing.
	The goal is to provide high-class customer service and to increase the company’s growth and revenue through sales maximisation.


Responsibilities


	Welcome and greet customers
	Manage point-of-sale processes, picking and invoicing
	Developing and sustaining long-lasting relationships with customers.
	Provide customers with information about products
	Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent sales service
	Developing in-depth knowledge of company products.
	Answering customers' questions and escalating complex issues to the relevant departments as needed.
	Maintaining an accurate record of all sales, customer appointments, and customer complaints.
	Ring up purchases.
	Follow all the company's policies and procedures


Requirements


	OND, HND, BSc
	Minimum of 2 years work experience in sales, customer rep in pharmacy or retail
	Computer literate.
	Good verbal and communication skills.
	Exceptional customer service skills.
	Proximity to Surulere, Ojuelegba, Yaba environments is very important


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 29th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: plugzoneonlinecv@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Store / Warehouse Officer

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client a Pharmaceutical wholesale distributor is looking for a Warehouse Officer is responsible for receiving materials incoming from vendor, managing warehouse/ store stock, replenishing shop floor stock and maintaining accurate stock record.


Warehouse Officer Responsibilities


	Maintain and monitor the accuracy of inventory and timely replenishment.
	Ensure all documentations related to responsibility are accurately processed, distributed and released to all concerned in a timely manner.
	Ensures all responsibilities are complied with any company policy, systems, and industry.
	Makes sure stock is arranged for easy physical count and stock taking
	Replenish shop floor stock constantly
	Managed inbound logistics
	Ensure the relevance and accuracy of all documentation relating to goods received and goods dispatched including labeling of all stock items
	Issues materials against authorized store requisition and keeps store issue voucher in appropriate file
	Report all warehouse activities on monthly for stock inventory, pallets kept at warehouses both internal and external.
	To ensure physical stock take correct in compared to system and give explanation for variances


Requirement


	NCE, OND, HND,
	Experience working in a store or warehouse would be advantageous
	High level of Integrity
	Excellent communication and inter-personal skills with ability to pay attention to detail.
	Physical stamina and ability to lift and move heavy objects
	Reporting skills and ability to analyze Information,
	Inventory Control, Reporting Skills.
	Proximity to Surulere, Ojuelegba , Yaba would be most preferred


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 23rd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: plugzoneonlinecv@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Company Driver

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Map out driving routes ahead of time to determine the most expedient trip
	Pick up and deliver goods to clients
	Assist clients with loading and unloading their goods
	Understand traffic laws
	Stay up-to-date on road conditions
	Adjust the route to avoid heavy traffic or road constructions, as needed
	Ensure the cleanliness of the vehicle and proper documents
	Schedule regular car service appointments and report any issues.


Requirements and skills


	Candidates should possess an SSCE / OND / HND qualification with relevant wok experience.
	Proven experience as a Driver
	A valid driver’s license, LASDRI
	Must be willing to resume immediately
	Work days: Mon to Fridays alternative Saturdays.
	Knowledge of Lagos roads, area, and neighborhoods
	A polite and professional disposition
	Must be able to drive manual and automatic
	Must live in Surulere, Yaba, Mushin, and environs.


Salary
N90,000 - N120,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 22nd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: plugzoneonlinecv@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
